name: TFM Game World
description:
Game World is a project by TheFoodMage.

This is a Prototype and will receive updates.

TheFoodMage is a 3D artist who is making art and characters for a game.
Yes, this AI model is made by the artist himself.
Mage's signature art style can be called by typing 'cartoon' or 'cartoon girl'.

Food Mage: "BECAUSE I AM THE ARTIST BEHIND THE MODEL, I CAN PROVIDE NEW TRAINING DATA TO THE COMMUNITY! COME JOIN AND REQUEST CONTENT! The goal is to continuously update the model with my new art until it's super awesome!"

Join The Discord (exclusive models, etc)
https://discord.gg/UYNxsNy6uz

Female characters always come out as shapely doll-like game style characters.

Game World will get various updates over time with cool videos.

The point is to keep building this model with art so the model gets better over time.

Release 0: This is the beginning

Release 0.5: Tagging overhaul

Release 1: Male Character overhaul

Release 2: Old people

Release 3: Special Move concepts (Fireball, teleport, etc)

Release 4: ???

Model is meant for SFW imagery with no NSFW training data, but it was also made with a merged model (Animatrix + Vividfemchar) as a base, so it can indeed produce potentially unwanted or NSFW results. That's AI in a nutshell! Make sure to type specific prompts when using this model, such as 'nsfw' in negative prompt.

Art from the model from Food Mage has been gathered over the last 3 years, so there are over 500 images in the training data, of digital art from a real 3D artist. Please wait on the cool updates

Please follow the permissions to users - do not use this to make money or for your own merges. My art style is pretty recognizable. A lot of artists hate AI or are scared of it for this reason. I am not.

Have fun! Post in the gallery and Discord!
